representation_information.name: DivX Video Codec, Version 5
representation_information.description: Bitstream encoding for video initially developed by the French video engineer Jerome Rota, aka Gej. Based on the MPEG-4 standard; DivX version 5.0 was released in March 2002; version 5.1 during 2003.

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
